title: NEVER GIVE UP.
content: “I WILL get it right,” said Harry to himself, stopping just long enough to toss the hair out of his eyes. “There’s a way to do it, and I’m not going to give up, see if I do.” “O, come on, Harry,” called Will; “what’s the use of hanging on so?” “What’s the use? Why, when I begin I don’t like to give up beat, and, what’s more, I don’t mean to.”

book.title: A Little Colored Boy and Other Stories
book.description: 简介： I think it more likely that God put an angels voice in Neddys throat to give us a taste of heavenly music, said grandma, looking up from the apples she was paring....
